entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @SenatorCollins Boy oh boy, your place in the history books is dropping by the minute. Let go of those pearls and for God's sake do something. Get him out of that White House before he kills more than the coronavirus did under his watch.
